title: REST Countries API
description: Built using React and Redux. It pulls data from the REST Countries API. It also features a color theme switcher.

title: E-commerce Product Page
description: Product page built using React, Redux, Typescript, and TailwindCSS. It features a lightbox product gallery and cart functionality.

title: Sunnyside Agency Landing Page
description: Fully responsive landing page using vanilla Javascript that follows the "mobile first" approach. The styles are written in SASS.
